It‚Äôs ideal for lightweight annotations, corrections, or quick visual emphasis.

### üìù How to use Short Magic Marker

üßæ Make sure you are inside the Dot where you want to place a short marker.

‚ú¥Ô∏è Double-click on the area where you want to add your short marker to open the Magic Marker bar.

‚úèÔ∏è Type a brief word, label, or phrase that you want to highlight inside the Dot.

üé® Change the background color of your marker to make it stand out or categorize information visually.

üî£ Attach an icon from the toolbar to represent the meaning or category of your marker.


::div{class="flex w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-130 py-4"}
:video{src="/short_magic_marker.mp4" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-full" controls autoplay muted loop}
::


### üí° Tips 

* Keep Magic Marker notes short‚Äîideal for labels, categories, or quick reminders.

* Use background colors to create visual grouping or to emphasize urgency or type of note.

* Adding icons helps teammates immediately understand the context at a glance.
